title: nirupama sundharaakara
sahitya:
nirupama sundaraakaraa (ati)
nisaya kumuda hita
neela mEgha shyaama shareeraa
(ati nirupama)

anupallavi 

surucira nava ratna kOTi tuLasee vana maali kaadi
sundara tara mama vihaari sura munigaNa mana sancaari
(ati nirupama)

caraNam 

raadhikaa kusuma nandini lalita raajini rajita ramaNi manOhari
caaruni campaka valli mallikaa sarasi suruci nava vraja yuvati jana
raasakaLEpara maNDala citraa naga naga maNi gana jwalita vicitraa
bOga sama naTana pulakasu gaatraa bhuvana sakala stitha boosura mitraa
(ati nirupama)
